Tomcat by default sends chunked responses =3D> Transfer-Encoding:chunked

I=
'm calculating the ETag for the response dynamically as the content is bein=
g written to the response stream. Since I'll know the final value of the ET=
ag only when the stream is closed, I indicate that using the Trailer header=
 =3D> Trailer: ETag

I'm ensuring that just before the stream is closed, I =
set the ETag header =3D> ETag: SomeETagValue

However, when I look at the r=
esponse on the client, the ETag header was never written.

Is this a tomcat=
 specific bug or am I doing something wrong?

Thanks,
Keyur
